item.description:
TODAY: My "FREE Live Outdoor Music" MeetUp is CANCELED DUE TO POOR WEATHER... If YOU are still interested in attending, please contact the venue (after 2pm) on their website: www.WadsworthMansion.com and/or their voicemail at 860-347-1064) as to whether the concert is "officially" canceled, or not. Even if it's not "officially" canceled, it'd not be a great picnic environment today, unfortunately.

As such... I'll be gathering up a group of friends to attend this evenings Funny Bone Comedy show - please see that posting for full details. All are welcome!
"Rob's Wacky Wednesday" gathering at the Funny Bone Comedy Club in Manchester's Buckland Hills Mall (must be 21+). This weekend's headliner "Jimmy Dore" will be performing. Buy a promo Tee-shirt at the Box Office for only $15 and get in for this, and EVERY WEDNESDAY, for FREE... for the rest of your life (whether attending with us or not). We typically have @ 6-20 people gather from my combined Single Event & MeetUp groups!

*** disregard the following ***

UPDATE: Gather @ 6:00. (Show starts @ 6:30).
>>> Look for me/us under three shiny BLUE STAR-shaped BALLOONS (may or may not be fully inflated/deflated) attached to a white stick w/ red reflector - LOW TO THE GROUND so as not to block the view of those behind us! At concerts, I traditionally stake out an area with 2-4 large blue-on-blue U-Haul moving blankets, likely fairly in the center, or farther, from the stage, not too close to loud speakers. If in doubt, call my cell# from an easy-for-me-to-spot-you location and I can direct you to us.

>>> BYO picnic dinner/snacks and beverages of choice. As always, be discreet, don't litter, and drive responsibly!

>>> We typically stay till after the crowd disperses enjoying the company of old and new friends.

>>> This event is also being posted on the "Singles Event", but without RSVP's, so likely several more people joining us than post on MeetUp. For Hartford County concerts we typically gather 12-24... C'mon MIDDLESEX COUNTY - come out to meet new local friends and have fun!

>>> Please check back here Wednesday after 3:00PM.

See you there!

- Rob Pudney, organizer
"FREE Live Outdoor Music"
C: (860) 690-9595

***

Wednesday, July 18 - Gathering @ 6:00 - FREE Concert begins at 6:30 p.m.

"Prelude" - (in-demand wedding band as well as show/dance band!)
The most versatile band this summer has been together 20 years and performed all over the Northeast. This six person band plays a wide variety of music that can be enjoyed by listeners of all ages.

Additional parking will be available at Snow School.

Directions: please MapQuest directions or see web site.

Where: Wadsworth Mansion
421 Wadsworth Street (Long Hill Estate)
Middletown, CT 06457
860-347-1064

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends

item.name: FINAL UPDATE: "Prelude" - Wadsworth Mansion - Middletown
